instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820_3115-B PLT_RESET_L
threads.message:
HI there. I have an intermittent issue with this board that I am able to replicate. Currently its pulling 130ma off the charger @18.5V. There was no liquid damage on this board. If I unplug and re-insert the magsafe (off the DC power supply set @19V) over and over, eventually this board will turn on. When it doesnt turn on, PPBUS_G3H fluctuates 7-9V, and PLT_RESET_L is 0v, all other voltages are within spec. It seems as though it will only turn on with a genuine 85W power supply, and not the 60W. IT will not stay powered on very long running off battery (too low voltage?)

I have replaced:
U7000
U4900
Q7030
Q7035
Q7950

Connecting a genuine 60W magsafe - No boot
Connecting a genuine 85W Magsafe - Boot
DC Power supply set @ 16.5V - No boot
DC Power supply set @ 19V - Boot (but sometimes not)

What should I be checking next?

threads.title: 820_3115-B PLT_RESET_L
threads.message:
Replace Q7080 and R/C7025.
Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7000.

threads.title: 820_3115-B PLT_RESET_L
threads.message: Replaced Q7080 and R7025,C7025. Resistance is 3.2ohms@ pins17/18, 20.1ohms @ pins 27/28. This appears to be normal. There is no change to boot (no power up @16.5v) powers up fine @19v. PPBUS+G3H is now normal @12.6v after these components have been replaced. PLT_RESET is still low (0.22v) and the green light on the charger slightly flickers while plugged in @16.5V (the same as when doing an SMC reset)

threads.title: 820_3115-B PLT_RESET_L
threads.message:
Do you always get 3V42_G3H?
Check if it always start in SMC bypass mode.

threads.title: 820_3115-B PLT_RESET_L
threads.message: 3.42 is always present. Board will turn on if I press power button with 60W magsafe connected, just not by itself. Board will boot in SMC bypass.

threads.title: 820_3115-B PLT_RESET_L
threads.message:
Board should turn on by itself when charger is connected, if battery is not present.

Do you get now 12.6V at PPBUS_G3H with 60W charger alone?
3V3_S5 and PM_SLP_SUS_L come up?
Just in case, check PCH's RTC signals.
